strokes.description: Drawing a gentle horizontal series of overlapping circles to create a soft, harmonious flow, mirroring the peaceful mood
Creating vertical overlapping circles that intersect with the horizontal ones, forming peaceful color blends
Adding diagonal overlapping circles to complete the tranquil composition with soft transitions

parsed_instruction.reasoning: The overlapping, semi-transparent circles created with the marker brush produce a gentle, flowing effect that embodies serenity. The slow drawing speeds (4-5) ensure smooth, deliberate strokes that enhance the peaceful atmosphere. The gradual blending of colors through overlapping creates a harmonious visual meditation, perfectly expressing a serene mood through soft, flowing forms.
